config.SwapForOilMaker.name: Swap for Oil Maker
config.SwapForOilMaker.tooltip: Swaps to truffle when clicking on Oil Maker
config.mainPage.title: Main
config.mainPage.paragraph: Config Options for the main features
config.useCustomSwapKey.name: Use Custom Swap Key
config.useCustomSwapKey.tooltip: If you should use the customizable Tool Swap Keybind or the game default.
config.swapKey.name: Tool Swap Keybind
config.swapKey.tooltip: The keybind to switch between tools (Only if you check the option above). Otherwise, it will use the default game keybind for Using Tools.
config.toggleKey.name: Toggle Mod Keybind
config.toggleKey.tooltip: The keybind to toggle the mod on or off.
config.lastToolKey.name: Last Tool Keybind
config.lastToolKey.tooltip: The keybind to switch back to the last used tool.
config.detectionMethod.name: Tool Selection Mode
config.RequireClick.name: Require click to switch tools
config.RequireClick.tooltip:
If active, you need to click to switch tools, otherwise it will always switch automatically with no need to click.
(This is recomended).
config.autoReturnToLastTool.name: Auto-Return to Last Tool
config.autoReturnToLastTool.tooltip: Automatically return to the previously used tool after swapping.
config.weaponsPage.title: Weapon Swaps
config.weaponOnMonsters.name: Weapon for Monsters
config.weaponOnMonsters.tooltip: Automatically switch to Melee Weapons when clicking on monsters.
config.alternativeWeaponOnMonsters.name: Alternative "Weapon for Monsters"
config.alternativeWeaponOnMonsters.toolt: When enabled, you will swap to a Weapon whenever there is a monster nearby, without the need to click, but if you have a Weapon in hands, it wont swap to anything
config.monsterRangeDetection.name: Monster Range Detection
config.monsterRangeDetection.tooltip: The range in which the mod detects monsters (in tiles).
config.WeaponForMineBarrels.name: Weapon for Barrels
config.WeaponForMineBarrels.tooltip: Automatically switch to Melee Weapons when clicking on Mine Barrels
config.IgnoreCrabs.name: Ignore Crabs
config.IgnoreCrabs.tooltip: The mod will not choose a weapon neither a pickaxe when clicking on crabs.
config.pickaxePage.title: Pickaxe Swaps
config.pickaxeForStoneAndOres.name: Pickaxe For Stone and Ores
config.pickaxeForStoneAndOres.tooltip: Automatically switch to Pickaxe when clicking on stones/ores.
config.pickaxeForBoulders.name: Pickaxe For Boulders
config.pickaxeForBoulders.tooltip: Automatically switch to Pickaxe when clicking on boulders.
config.pickaxeOverWateringCan.name: Pickaxe Over Watering Can
config.pickaxeOverWateringCan.tooltip: Prioritize using the pickaxe if you have it in your hand instead of switching to the watering can on unwatered crops.
config.axePage.title: Axe Swaps
config.axeForTwigs.name: Axe For Twigs
config.axeForTwigs.tooltip: Automatically switch to Axe when clicking on twigs.
config.axeForTrees.name: Axe For Trees
config.axeForTrees.tooltip: Automatically switch to Axe when clicking on Trees.

config.axeForStumpsAndLogs.tooltip: Automatically switch to Axe when clicking on Stumps and Logs.
config.axeForFruitTrees.name: Axe For Fruit Trees
config.axeForFruitTrees.tooltip: Automatically switch to Axe when clicking on Fruit Trees.
config.axeForGiantCrops.name: Axe For GiantCrops
config.axeForGiantCrops.tooltip: Automatically switch to Axe when clicking on GiantCrops.

config.ScytheForWeeds.tooltip: Automatically switch to the scythe when clicking on weeds.

config.WateringCanForGardenPot.name: Watering Can for Garden Pot
config.WateringCanForGardenPot.tooltip: Automatically switch to the WateringCan when clicking on garden pots.
config.WateringCanForUnwateredCrop.name: Watering Can for Unwatered Crop
config.WateringCanForUnwateredCrop.toolt: Automatically switch to the WateringCan when clicking on unwatered crops.

config.WateringCanForPetBowl.tooltip: Automatically switch to the WateringCan when clicking on Pet Bowls.
config.WateringCanForWater.name: Watering Can for Water
config.WateringCanForWater.tooltip: Automatically switch to the WateringCan when clicking on water sources to refill it.

config.OresForFurnace.name: Ores for Furnace
config.OresForFurnace.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first ore when clicking on furnaces.
config.FertilizerForCrops.name: Fertilizer for Crops
config.FertilizerForCrops.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first fertilizer when clicking on planted crops.
config.MineralsForCrystalarium.name: Minerals for Crystalarium
config.MineralsForCrystalarium.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first mineral when clicking on Crystalariums.
config.MilkForCheesePress.name: Milk for Cheese Press
config.MilkForCheesePress.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first milk when clicking on Cheese Press.
config.EggsForMayoMachine.name: Eggs for Mayonnaise Machine
config.EggsForMayoMachine.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first egg when clicking on Mayonnaise Machines.
config.BoneForBoneMill.name: Bone for Bone Mill Machine
config.BoneForBoneMill.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first bone when clicking on Bone Mill Machine.
config.WoolForLoom.name: Wool for Loom
config.WoolForLoom.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first wool when clicking on loom.
config.FishForSmoker.name: Fish for Smoker
config.FishForSmoker.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first fish when clicking on smoker.
config.FishForBaitMaker.name: Fish for Bait Maker
config.FishForBaitMaker.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first fish when clicking on Bait Maker.
config.BaitForCrabPot.name: Bait for Crab Pot
config.BaitForCrabPot.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first bait when clicking on Crab Pot.
config.swapForSeedMaker.name: Swap for Seed Maker
config.swapForSeedMaker.tooltip: Swaps to first Crop in your inventory for Seed Maker
config.swapForKegs.name: Swap for Kegs
config.swapForKegs.tooltip: Swaps to first fruit or vegetables when clicking on Kegs
config.swapForPreservesJar.name: Swap for Preserves Jar
config.swapForPreservesJar.tooltip: Swaps to first fruit or vegetables when clicking on Preserves Jar
config.SwapForDehydrator.name: Swap for Dehydrator
config.SwapForDehydrator.tooltip: Swaps to first fruit or mushroom when clicking on Dehydrator
config.anyToolForWeeds.name: Any Tool for Weeds
config.anyToolForWeeds.tooltip: Automatically switch to any tool instead of the scythe when clicking on weeds (fibers).
config.fishingRodOnWater.name: FishingRod On Water
config.fishingRodOnWater.tooltip: Automatically switch to the Fishing Rod when clicking on water outside of Farm.
config.ignoreGrowingTrees.name: Ignore Growing Trees
config.ignoreGrowingTrees.tooltip: Trees that are not fully grown does not swap to Axe.
config.seedForTilledDirt.name: Seeds for Tilled Dirt
config.seedForTilledDirt.tooltip: Swaps to the first seed when clicking on tilled dirt.
config.PanForPanningSpots.name: Pan for Panning Spots
config.PanForPanningSpots.tooltip: Automatically switch to Pan when clicking on Panning Spots.
config.HayForFeedingBench.name: Hay for Feeding Bench
config.HayForFeedingBench.tooltip: Toggle to automatically provide hay for the feeding bench.
config.MilkPailForCowsAndGoats.name: Milk Pail for Cows and Goats
config.MilkPailForCowsAndGoats.tooltip: Automatically use the milk pail when interacting with cows and goats.
config.ShearsForSheeps.name: Shears for Sheep
config.ShearsForSheeps.tooltip: Automatically use the shears when interacting with sheep.
config.disableTractorSwap.name: Disable Auto Swap in Tractor
config.disableTractorSwap.tooltip: Disables Auto Swap in Tractor ALWAYS, otherwise you can use the Toggle Keybind to disable it
config.AnyToolForSupplyCrates.name: Any Tool for Supply Crates
config.AnyToolForSupplyCrates.tooltip: Automatically switch to the first tool when clicking on Supply Crates.
